## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G29100](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G29100)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BHLH68, PFA3</u>
- **Gene Name:** BASIC HELIX LOOP HELIX 68, PERICYCLE FACTOR TYPE-A 3
- **Description:**   basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) DNA-binding superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2119901
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [bhlh68-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No obvious morphological phenotypes. Slight increase in rosette size, lateral root density but largely similar to Col-0.
   - [pfa123]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Decrease in auxin-induced  mitotic activity (metaphase and anaphase cells) of the pericycle.
